bag.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a container made of paper, cloth, or thin plastic, that usually opens at the top
bag.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Don’t leave your bag in the car.
bag.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a large bag that you use to carry your clothes etc when you are travelling
bag.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: Just throw your bags in the back of the car.
bag.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: the amount that a bag will hold
bag.translation[0].definitions[4].defini: the number of birds or animals that someone kills when they go hunting
bag.translation[0].definitions[4].exampl: We had a good bag that day.
bag.translation[0].note_box[0].sections[: Store the beans in a paper bag in the fridge.
The supermarket no longer gives free carrier bags.
She loaded her shopping bags into the back of the car.
Hey, don't forget your school bag!
I noticed that the man was wearing trainers and carrying a sports bag.
Big shoulder bags are fashionable this year.
She was carrying a smart leather bag.
For the evening all you need is a little clutch bag.
She put her lipstick in a black velvet evening bag.
I bought a big striped beach bag.
All you need to take is an overnight bag.
Your travel bag must not weigh more than 20 kilos.
I left my sponge bag in the hotel bathroom.
Use the black bin bags provided by the council.
Lisa was carrying the bag containing the beach towels.
I don't think that bag will hold all those books..
The customs officer opened my bag.
I've emptied my bags and I still can't find it.
Mum packed a bag for a day at the beach.
She unpacked her bags and put her clothes away.
bag.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: He got a job bagging groceries.
bag.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to manage to get something that a lot of people want
bag.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: Try to bag a couple of seats at the front.
bag.translation[1].definitions[2].defini: to score a goal or a point in sport
bag.translation[1].definitions[2].exampl: Larsson bagged his thirtieth goal of the season in Celtic’s win.
bag.translation[1].definitions[3].defini: to kill or catch an animal or bird
